alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 2:54AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Alabama and Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, in southeast Alabama, Geneva. In Panhandle Florida, Holmes, Jackson and Washington. * WHEN...Until 400 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 154 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Graceville, Marianna, Malone, Cottondale, Greenwood, Esto, Campbellton, Noma, Black, Bascom, Jacobs, Jacob City, Ellaville, Browntown, Richter Crossroads, Cottondale Airport, Bahoma, Sills, Cobb Crossroads and Tendil Crossing. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
